statement.name: getConfigurazioneSchede
getIdenScheda
statement.sql: select max(iden) iden from radsql.cc_schede_xml where iden_visita=to_number(?) and funzione=?

statement.name: eliminaScheda
statement.sql: begin update radsql.cc_schede_xml set deleted = 'S' , data_ultima_modifica = sysdate where funzione= ? and iden_visita = to_number(?) and iden = to_number(?); ? := SQL%ROWCOUNT; end;
